items.title: “I attended a wedding and thought that those two experiences really spoke to each other, and that they also said something about these families that are somewhat scattered,”

“The fair shows us once again that vacations are maintaining the trend that emerged after the pandemic, when they became one of people’s basic needs. It is encouraging to see that these gradual increases are continuing despite the economic context, in which everyone is calculating their budget more carefully and looking to the future with caution. It is clear that many Romanians do not want to give up the joy of traveling and are looking for solutions, such as Travel Prime vacation subscriptions, to get as many benefits and discounts as possible. The figures recorded at the fair are also due to our team of consultants, because the experience of receiving advice from well-trained people matters to visitors, especially those who want to discover new destinations,”
“If they don’t break one then I’m a little bit disappointed,”
“It was like, ‘Hey, this can be a great addition, but definitely not a necessity,’”

– At Kongeparet reiser på ferie er noe de vanligvis gjør, og noe jeg unner dem. En av kronprinsens kjerneoppgaver er å representere landet ved store begivenheter, så selvfølgelig skal han være til stede der,
“Bir çoğunun çocukluktan beri kurduğu bir hayal var ve bazı durumlarda bu hayal dünyanın gözleri önünde tuzla buz oluyor. Ancak bazılarının bununla baş etmek için bir sistemi var…”
